message.body: hi there, how different is zeroverse from zeromail? Does it scale better or all the mails of all the users get stored on the fs of every single user too?
I'm posting a how-to in spanish for configuring zeronet for starting at start-up via tor :) This will be at criptica.org
you can already find it at https://www.criptica.org/wiki/ZeroNet
If you see something to improve, please zeromail me. We are publishing it on our blog and social media (not a big deal, but you know)
The most part is config files with english comments. Just "the narrative" is in spanish. I mean, it works, but every check is welcome :)
